column5: If I threw a rock at the ones on my lawn (15)...I'd be hard pressed NOT to hit one...
Baffles me too Norm.. but they seem to have a higher IQ than my hunting crew!!
When I took my Turkey hunting course, the guy told us that Turkeys can hear you thinking.
You've got broad shoulders Marty.. just get that damn horse would ya.. Daughters boyfriend just about pinged it off when it leaped the road this afternoon in the snow storm..
Get your pitching arm in shape Beansie. I'll be waiting for the call to come over for a nice wild turkey dinner
They know when hunting season is...
isn't that always the case.  i had 15 grouse living behind my shed this summer.

put a gun in your hand and you will never see them again. Last deer season i had 50 come by regularily then during turkey never seen one     quote name='Dr. Salvelinus' date='05 December 2010 - 11:18 PM' timestamp='1291605514' post='525757'] isn't that always the case.  i had 15 grouse living behind my shed this summer.
You might have a long wait my friend...I'm not a fan of turkey...  I'd rather have a nice prime rib roast of beef anyday...

you know it, there have been days when getting out of the driveway has been difficult with toms the size of well fed porkers.....stubborn and almost daring you to run them over. But come the season they are scarce..lol..they really are...I know a spot tho and...

lemmee see if I can dif out this pic. There was a hobby farm of peacocks not far from here and for the longest time this outcast turkey used to frequent our dock for about a week a year and it was a crossbred Turkey/peacock....all the others birds wouldnt play with him at all....kinda like rudolph..lol
Never took you for a "RUB IT IN" kinda guy Norm.   Wayne on the other hand,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,,

Seems like lots of gobblers around right now and I see them in the fields just about everytime I head down the road. I had 3 in the yard a couple days back and 7 more at the end of the driveway this morning when I was heading into town.  My bud down the road called yesterday to say he had 19 in his front yard
I see flocks of them on my daily drive to and from and at work...surprised I haven't run any over yet
If you think deer  cause damage,you should see what a turkey in flight can do.25-30 pounds of solid bird,right through the windshield.
My sister walked up to a flock , picked one up and pet it on the head.
